column3: â€œAroma of this strain is amazing. Almost like a citrus cream. Taste definitely lives up to the smell. Very fruity tasting.  Defiantly an expander of the lungs. I know its an Indica, but Rainbow Jones sure does feel more like a Hybrid. Defiantly a fan and Recommend!â€

â€œI have been growing Rainbow Jones for around 3 years. I have 2 Phenos in my garden...there is a 3rd that I've had in the past. One of the Phenos I have smells like grape Popsicles when vegging, then takes more of a sour grape candy....the other pheno is more Casey Jones leaning and has more of a fuel/grapey smell. They both yield very well, the 3rd pheno has more of a grape Windex kind of taste and smell. It's more o...â€

â€œI was pleasantly surprised with this strain! Although there is not special to note flavor wise, but the body high and euphoria make this a great Indica to wind down with. There is a bit of couch lock, but its controllable and won't put you down unless you decide to crash. sweet dreams after!â€

â€œThis strain is great. Relaxes and slams you at the same time.  Nice flavor, great buzz.â€

â€œBeautiful colors to it, along with its amazing smell. Heavy indica but not the type that will make you fall asleep. Very nice mellow body high. Definitely gonna get it time and time again.â€
â€œVery sticky and great scent, smooth and beautifully colored.â€
